Colophony
Tall oil

comments.value: Occupational asthma from colophony; Colophony (rosin) is also used in paper sizing, adhesives, paints, varnishes, printing inks, and plasticisers. Colophony is known to cause allergic contact dermatitis; occupational asthma has been documented for soldering (heated rosin) and for the process of manufacturing rosin core solder, and rubber tires. Reference: "Colophony--uses, health effects, airborne measurement and analysis." Sadhra S, et al. Ann Occup Hyg 1994 Aug;38(4):385-96.
